title: Going the Distance
description: [Siren Classic Erotic Alternative Paranormal Romance, M/M, werewolves, public exhibition, HEA] Greg Stevens and Andrew Dean met online years ago through a mutual interestâ€”they are both shifters, enhanced humans able to take the form of wolves at will. When Greg's English pack decides to form a merger with an American pack, he jumps at the chance to act as an ambassador, as well as meet Andrew in the flesh. After a nervous start, their relationship quickly moves up to the next level, and love soon blossoms. At the same time, though, Greg is busy interviewing Andrew's pack to see if they're suitable to merge with his own. Are the two packs compatible? And what will happen to Greg and Andrew's relationship if they aren't? ** A Siren Erotic Romance
author: J.C. Holly
